about_the_game:
A VHS/PS1 Survival Horror Experience!


Play as Emilia, a young woman cursed by an ancient rosary, transported into the Realm of the Inquisitor, an oneiric dimension filled with the ghosts victims of the Inquisitor himself. Solve puzzles, free ghosts, and escape the Inquisitor!

Atmospheric Gameplay

Encounter the Ghosts of the Inquisitor's previous victims as you navigate the cursed dimension. You will unlock secrets and items to aid your journey, open new paths, explore new rooms and progress through the game.

If The Inquisitor is chasing you, you have three options: run, hide, or stunt him with Holy Water! - you cannot defeat The Inquisitor. He will always come back for you!

Immerse yourself in a survival horror experience that recreates the atmosphere of classic late 90's. With its tank controls, cinematic third-person camera angles, and controller-based gameplay, this title captures the essence of a bygone era.

Features

  • Get thrilled by the old school aesthetic of classic Survival Horror.
  • Experience a rich story about a Female protagonist looking for her lost mother
  • Listen to an amazing Soundtrack Inspired by Giallo Cinema
  • Explore the surreal Cursed Realm
  • Panic when you hear the steps of the Inquisitor behind you!
  • Enjoy a short but dense rich story game

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in this game contain blood and religious symbols. Discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM Or Greater with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.2GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM Or Greater with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
